title: S9 Esports is seeking players for the 2019 season

embed.description: The latest Tweets from S9 eSports (@S9esports). Official twitter of S9 eSports | eSports Club. España

body:
Greetings everyone.

My name is Andrés Álvarez, I'm the Manager of S9 Esports Club.

From S9 Esports we want to announce the opening of our transfer market for our main squad that will represent us during this 2019 season.

The club is looking for an elo between Grand Master and Challenger.

These players will have the opportunity to play the biggest tournaments national and internationally.

The club wants to start seeing the players levels in Tournaments such as [La bruma, Circuito tormenta, Gamergy ...] among many others, although the objective of this Squad is to compete at the highest level, that is SLO.

All the expenses of the tournaments will be covered by the club and you will have the best components within the Technical Staff of the Squad.

The basic requirements of the club in order to be able to enter are:

1. Be serious and punctual.
2. Have the elo mentioned above in a current way.
3. Time availability.
4. Availability for face-to-face.
5. Be over 16 years old.

For anyone who is interested in the project or have questions, please use our contact methods as follows:

* Nick of League Of Legends: S9 Cloudtwin
* Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/S9Esports
* Email: info@s9esports.com

Thank you for your attention.

A cordial greeting.
